title: Which countries are more friendly to start a technology-based startup other than the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s an interesting question. Here’s the list of countries ranked based on the number of funding rounds involving tech companies over a period of 5 years. China (9.5K rounds , 6K companies)India (8.6K rounds, 4.1K companies)United Kingdom (7.7K rounds , 4.6K companies)Canada (3.8K rounds, 1.9K companies)France (2.5K rounds, 1.7K companies)
Canada, Australia, most of Europe and any place you are. If you are looking for a startup financing US is still one of the friendliest countries. Good luck.
